Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class Player extends Object implements PropertyChangeListener
Player contains the information of a player in the game

      method playAssistant allows the player to pick and play an assistant
      Parameters:
      assistant - assistant chosen
      assistantPlayed - assistant already played
      Returns:
      returns boolean true or false if the assistant chosen can be played or not
      Throws:
      NoSuchAssistantException - thrown if the assistant chosen doesn't exist
